text.tspan: Second Skin (PA) - The reduction to Movement Speed from Armour is
Shield Other (1R) [RE] {1Resilience} - When another Character takes
Damage from an Attack Check, if you are within a number of Spaces up to
your Movement Speed from them, you can move to the nearest open Space
adjacent to them and take that Damage instead. This Movement does not
Expert Smith (Flavoured: Combat Expert) (PA) - All your Combat
Buddy System (PA) - You can choose a Friendly Character to go next in the
Charger (PA) - Whenever you take the Dash Action, your next Attack Check
this Round is Exerted at no cost
Expert Movement (PA) - Ignore the first 2 instances of Difficult Movement in
Interceptor (PA) - You can Block Attack Checks that Target Characters
Parting Gift (AW) [RE] {1Cleverness} - If a Character Targets you with an
Opportunity Attack that results in any Failure, you may make an Attack
Embrace The Pain (PA) - You gain 1 Damage Reduction. While you are
Bloodied, you instead gain 2 Damage Reduction. Additionally, When
Suffering the Bloodied Condition the Penalties to your Attack Checks are
Peak Fitness (PA) - Any Athletics Skill Check you Exert that results in a
Moderate Success or better Refunds the Strain used to Exert it.

Cumbersome - This Combat Technique takes up 1

Destructive {1} - Attack Checks Inflicts twice as
much Damage to Obstacles and Unattended
Objects and treat Heavy Cover as if it is Light Cover
Area Effect {2} - Each Character within one Space
of the Target Suffers half of the Damage Suffered by
